name: Tiny Viking Adventure
description:
Your land is takes by evil demons, you're the only one who can save your village.
Find powerfull weapons to purge your foes, One weapon is not enough - you can use two to double the damage.
Your armor will help you on your jorney, giving you more power. And don't forget to eat.

-Upgrade your hero to face more powerfull monsters
-Find Armor sets to enhance your power.
-Different weapons, each with unique perks.
-Crash barrels to find off-hand weapons, less durable, but as deadly.
-Different locations to explore
-Variety of enemies to fight.
-Runestones will aid you.
